data.body: Resolve conflict between user-level default ship_with_review guidance and foolery repo policy forbidding PR/review workflows unless explicitly requested. Update user AGENTS note, ship_with_review skill metadata, and repo AGENTS with explicit local disable rule.
data.description: Resolve conflict between user-level default ship_with_review guidance and foolery repo policy forbidding PR/review workflows unless explicitly requested. Update user AGENTS note, ship_with_review skill metadata, and repo AGENTS with explicit local disable rule.
data.title: Align agent instructions to disable default ship_with_review in foolery
